metadata.name: The Great Escape
metadata.description:
This NFT represents a true one-of-a-kind piece of digital artwork, capturing the beauty and wonder of space through the eyes of two astronauts floating hand in hand, ready for an adventure together. 

It serves as a powerful reminder that even in the face of fear and challenges, love prevails. The vastness of space symbolises the boundless potential of love and connection. 

This NFT is not just a digital collectible, but a unique and mesmerising piece of art crafted from my imagination, passion for space, Adobe software and paid imagery. It's a piece of my artistic soul that I am proud to share with the world, and a true treasure for any collector.
